result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Richard J Gorton
Current: PO Box 488, River Falls, WI 54022 United States  (Effective: 08-01-2022)
Prior: Homeless, River Falls, WI 54022

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, W.L.C.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Defendant shall contact Kara Rheingans, Case Manager - Behavioral Health at 715-716-0920 within 48 hours. Ms. Rheingans shall conduct an intake screening to determine appropriateness for inclusion in programming offered by Behavioral Health. If you are screened in for services, you shall participate in programming as recommended. Failure to contact Ms. Rheingans or participate may be considered a violation of your bond. 

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

1:46 PM CO: RMW, REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Lindabaur. ADA: Michael Becker  DF ATTY:  Jeremiah Harrelson for today  Defendant Richard J Gorton appeared by video, in custody. DE confirms address and DOB. DE understands charges and possible penalties. Waive reading. DE does qualify for PD. NG. Reserve on jurisdictional objections. Bond argument. ADA Becker hasn't spoken with Victim, but 72 hour no contact was enforced. Court orders bond. Court sets SETC with DA and PSC. Adjourned at 1: pm.  gll
